desc: Guacamole Recipe and Video - Cilantro and cayenne give this classic guacamole a tasty kick. Serve it smooth or chunky.
Easy Guacamole Recipe and Video - A simple go-to guacamole recipe that makes you beg for more. Try it if you're learning how to make guac, or just need to whip up a batch for friends.
Chef John's Classic Guacamole Recipe and Video - Chef John uses classic techniques to bring out more intense flavors in this classic avocado dip.
Asparagus 'Guacamole' Recipe and Video - This is an avocado-less recipe for guacamole that can be served with veggies or chips.
Best Guacamole Recipe and Video - For chips or a taco topping, guacamole--enhanced with lemon and onion--is a forever favorite.
Chunky Paleo Guacamole Recipe and Video - This chunky guacamole is paleo-friendly and delicious!
Yummy Guacamole Recipe - This refreshing guacamole has lots of lime juice, cilantro, and green onions for a dip everyone will love. Serve with tortilla chips or as topping for Mexican dishes.
Simply Guacamole Recipe - This is so easy and so good. It's always the hit of the party and it's gone before anything else on the table.
Spicy Lentil Guacamole Recipe and Video - Cooked sprouted green lentils bring extra flavor and texture to this spicy guacamole with jalapeno peppers and fresh lime juice.
LuvAnn's Guacamole Recipe - This great dip is always the first to go at our barbeques. It's a simple guacamole, perfect for dipping tortilla chips or serving with tacos.
Traditional Mexican Guacamole Recipe - This guacamole uses the traditional ingredients of avocado, lemon juice, cilantro, and onion. Spice it up with jalapeno pepper if you like!
Fresh Guacamole Recipe - This guacamole is fresh, green, and a little zesty.
Guacamole My Way Recipe - Creamy avocados, onion and diced tomatoes combine to make the best dip for tortilla chips! This guacamole is also good as a condiment for sandwiches.
Chipotle Guacamole Recipe - This spicy guacamole recipe is very easy to customize to your own tastes. The addition of lime and chipotle puts a spin on a simple recipe to separate it from the pack.
Mango Guacamole Recipe - Try this sweet, tangy, and spicy guacamole with serrano chile peppers, cilantro, and mango as a nice accompaniment to tortilla chips on a warm summer day.
Grilled Guacamole Recipe - A chunky, creamy guacamole with just the right amount of zip!  Grilled avocados add a smoky, caramelized taste.

Easy Never Forgotten Guacamole Recipe - This guacamole has been a hit at our house for years. Great for the Superbowl or any occasion. Sour cream and cream cheese make the guac extra creamy. Spice it up with crushed red pepper.

Holiday Guacamole Recipe - I tried this recipe at a friend of the family's. It is such a great twist to traditional guacamole. I wanted others to be able to try this. This not only tastes great but it looks nice as well. Don't be scared off by the ingredients, it is great with unsalted tortilla chips!
Tomatillo Guacamole Recipe - Tomatillos are a colorful addition to everyone's favorite Mexican-inspired dip.
Ethnic Guacamole Recipe - An authentic guacamole recipe passed down through generations includes chile de arbol peppers, tomatoes, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime juice.
